subject: HtmlUnit vs jWebUnit
msgSnippet: Hi All, I am currently in the process of choosing a testing framework for testing our web application. I am inclined to use either HtmlUnit or jWebUnit, but
messageBody:
Hi All,
I am currently in the process of choosing a
testing framework for testing our web application. I
am inclined to use either HtmlUnit or jWebUnit, but
not sure if one is better than the other.

Appreciate if any of you can share your
experience/thoughts.


Thank you
Srini
